section.name: s1
section.heading: Citation
section.content: These rules may be cited as the Labour Tribunal (Forms) Rules.

section.name: s2
section.heading: Forms
section.content: The forms contained in the Schedule may be used in the tribunal with such variations as the circumstances may require.
